gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 129, Pistons 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Pistons, 129-102. Jaylen Brown led the way with 33 points (17 in the third quarter) and four rebounds for the Celtics, with Payton Pritchard adding 20 points, nine assists, and two rebounds in the victory. James Wiseman tallied a season-high 24 points, along with nine rebounds and four assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Celtics win their eighth straight game and improve to 56-14, while the Pistons fall to 12-58.
